FAQSection.title: Frequently Asked <accent>Questions</accent>
FAQSection.subtitle: Answers to frequently asked questions about AmanAja

questions.question: Is AmanAja free?
questions.answer: Yes, AmanAja is currently accessible to everyone and is free of charge.

questions.question: How does AmanAja's AI work?
questions.answer: AmanAja uses AI with Gemini, fine-tuned for fraud detection needs.

questions.question: Is my data secure?
questions.answer: Secure. We do not store your personal data. Previously used data is only stored as a small context for the next detection.

questions.question: How long does the analysis take?
questions.answer: The analysis can be completed in an average of 1 minute.

questions.question: Can AmanAja detect all types of fraud?
questions.answer: AmanAja can detect various types of digital fraud including phishing, prize scams, investment fraud, and so on.
